Address.Address1: 2 Chong Wen Men Nei St, Dong Cheng Dist

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Inner Mongolia Grand Hotel Wangfujing, you'll be centrally located in Beijing, convenient to Malls at Oriental Plaza and Tiananmen Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Beijing Goldenport Motor Park and Dong Hua Men Night Market.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 339 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional amenities include a hair salon and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Malls at Oriental Plaza - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Beijing Goldenport Motor Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Dong Hua Men Night Market - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi

The preferred airport for Inner Mongolia Grand Hotel Wangfujing is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 24.5 km / 15.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
